resources.string: This application requires Barcode Scanner. Would you like to install it?
Tap to capture. Pinch/Stretch to zoom
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
I hope you find this app useful, and please email me any suggestion/criticism!
How good do you consider this app?
Total crap! Removing it now forever!
There are better apps out there.
Anything you want to tell me?

Changes in version 1.2:
 - When creating a product with shop filter selected, it's used in the field.
 - Added currency format in some places (some more pending).
 - Checkout screen shows what we're putting in cart.
 - Keyboard hides when you don't need it (most of the time).
 - Barcode scanning to add and buy products.
 - Fixed some bugs.

Changes in version 1.1:
 - Removed "test data" button.
 - Added in blue screen filter by mall.
 - Added screen for product price history (invoked by long clicking over a product).
 - Added screen to send feedback. Please use it!
 - Welcome screen with changes in new version (the screen you're watching).

Welcome to Shop List Simple!
 
 I tried to make this app small & simple, with very few components:
 - Yellow screen to see current shopping list.
 - Blue screen to manage the whole product list.
 
 Some more things will be added in next versions, but I'll try to keep it simple.
 Your first step now should be clicking on 'Edit shoppling list' button to go to blue screen, and start adding things to buy.
